analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x69ed072262c41b72b335df4b1a80d31513e0f00f.sol#348-362) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x69ed072262c41b72b335df4b1a80d31513e0f00f.sol#360-361)

DekzCoinCrowdsale.takeAllTheMoney (/unique_chucks/19/0x69ed072262c41b72b335df4b1a80d31513e0f00f.sol#416-429) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x69ed072262c41b72b335df4b1a80d31513e0f00f.sol#425-426)
